alert.note: Alert for Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 18 at 12:57AM CDT until June 18 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1256 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Prescott, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nevada County, including the following locations... Boughton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
